description: Details about the Member Milestone Chat event, this is only set if the type is 'memberMilestoneChatEvent'.

memberLevelName.description: The name of the Level at which the viever is a member. The Level names are defined by the YouTube channel offering the Membership. In some situations this field isn't filled.

memberMonth.description: The total amount of months (rounded up) the viewer has been a member that granted them this Member Milestone Chat. This is the same number of months as is being displayed to YouTube users.

userComment.description: The comment added by the member to this Member Milestone Chat. This field is empty for messages without a comment from the member.
